mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginiae partis australis, et Floridae partis orientalis, interjacentiumq[ue] regionum nova descriptio
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Blaeu, Willem Janszoon, 1571-1638
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 38 x 49 cm. on sheet 48 x 63 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Covers Atlantic Coast from Virginia to Florida.
Bar scale above the neat line on the lower margin: Milliaria Germanica communia.
Possibly from Blaeu's Grooten atlas, Amsterdam, 1664-1665. Cf. Cumming, and Phillips, Geographical atlases, no. 471.
Includes decorative cartouche and coats of arms.
Descriptive text in Dutch on verso, with caption title "Florida," signature mark "H" and catchword "sijn." Page number "9" at upper right.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: South Atlantic States--Maps--Early works to 1800.
